description: Retrieves the access status of your account to the EC2 serial console of all instances. By default, access to the EC2 serial console is disabled for your account. For more information, see Manage account access to the EC2 serial console in the Amazon EC2 User Guide.

nested_items.name: SerialConsoleAccessEnabled
nested_items.description: If true, access to the EC2 serial console of all instances is enabled for your account. If false, access to the EC2 serial console of all instances is disabled for your account.

nested_items.name: ManagedBy
nested_items.description: The entity that manages access to the serial console. Possible values include:
account - Access is managed by the account.
declarative-policy - Access is managed by a declarative policy and can't be modified by the account.
